content.text: Doing well, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing alright, a bit tired. I'm taking online classes and that has been keeping me busy.
Online classes, that can be challenging, but it's also very convenient! What are you studying?
I'm studying business. I'm hoping to get a job in marketing one day.
Marketing is a great field! I love to sew, and I like to design my own clothes. I've always wanted to work in the fashion industry, but I don't know if I have the talent.
I'm sure you have the talent, you just need to practice! I'm not very creative, but I do enjoy watching CSI.
CSI is a great show! I love the crime solving aspect of it. I've also spent a lot of time watching my lizard Gila bask in the sun.
Lizards are so cool! I've never had one, but I've always wanted one.
They're great pets! They're very low-maintenance, and they're really cute.
